  • Uses of Message in it.polimi.ingsw.network.message

    Subclasses of Message in it.polimi.ingsw.network.message
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AllGameMessage
    This class implements the AllGameMessage,it extends Message this message is used in the class ClientGameModel to obtain the needed game model informations
    class 
    AssistantsSendMessage
    This class implements the AssistantsSendMessage,it extends Message it sends the list of assistants
    class 
    CharacterTableMessage
    This class implements the CharacterTableMessage,it extends Message the character table message contains the table money,the reduced character's list and the map of player id and money
    class 
    ChooseTeamMessage
    This class implements the ChooseTeamMessage,it extends Message this message handles the team selection of a player
    class 
    ChooseTowerColorMessage
    This class implements the ChooseTowerColorMessage,it extends Message this message handles the selection of a tower color
    class 
    ChooseWizardMessage
    This class implements the ChooseWizardMessage,it extends Message this message handles the selection of a wizard
    class 
    DashboardMessage
    This class implements the DashboardMessage,it extends Message this message contains a reduced dashboard
    class 
    GenericMessage
    This class implements a GenericMessage,it extends Message
    class 
    LobbyMessage
    This class implements the LobbyMessage,it extends Message this message contains the available lobbies
    class 
    MoveMotherNatureMessage
    This class implements the MoveMotherNatureMessage,it extends Message this message contains the index of the island where mother nature has to move
    class 
    MoveStudentDashboardMessage
    This class implements the MoveStudentDashboardMessage,it extends Message this message contains the index of the entrance list student to be moved in the hall
    class 
    MoveStudentIslandMessage
    This class implements the MoveStudentIslandMessage,it extends Message this message contains the index of the entrance list student to be moved,and the index of the destination island
    class 
    NewLobbyMessage
    This class implements the NewLobbyMessage,it extends Message this message contains a new lobby
    class 
    PlayerJoinMessage
    This class implements the PlayerJoinMessage,it extends Message this message contains the list of players of a lobby
    class 
    SelectAssistantMessage
    This class implements the SelectAssistantMessage,it extends Message this message contains the assistant selected by the sender
    class 
    StringMessage
    This class implements the StringMessage,it extends Message this message contains a string
    class 
    SyncInitMessage
    This class implements the SyncInitMessage,it extends Message this message contains the available team players,the available tower colors and the available wizards
    class 
    SyncStateMessage
    This class implements the SyncStateMessage,it extends Message this message contains the various possible game states
    class 
    TableMessage
    This class implements the TableMessage,it extends Message this message contains all the items that are on the table
    class 
    TakeFromCloudMessage
    This class implements the SyncInitMessage,it extends Message this message contains the index of the chosen cloud
    class 
    ThrownAssistantMessage
    This class implements the ThrownAssistantMessage,it extends Message this message contains the thrown assistant
    class 
    ThrownCharacterMessage
    This class implements the ThrownCharacterMessage,it extends Message this message contains the thrown character
    class 
    UseCharacterMessage
    This class implements the UseCharacterMessage,it extends Message this message contains the character parameters
